channel.title: NPC Drops
channel.description: [b]How can I make a NPC drop something? I have delta so please tell me how I can do it on delta. :D If you don't know what I mean I want like a green dragon to drop a clue scroll.. where would I go and whats the code to put it in? This is 317 FYI [/b]
